    Admin - Class in users
    The Admin class is a class that represents a school administrator.
    Admin(String, String, String, String, School) - Constructor for class users.Admin
    Constructs an Admin with first name, last name, username, password, school, and a randomly assigned ID.
    Admin(String, String, String, String, School, int) - Constructor for class users.Admin
    Constructs an Admin with first name, last name, username, password, school, and an ID.
    admins - Variable in class school.School
